Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Coalesce {2}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this for {2}{U}{U} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Shed the Human Rind can't be blocked.
